name: Jägermörder 1: Chemical Lab
description: Jägermörder 1: Chemical Lab is a single-level PWAD designed by Derek MacDonald (Afterglow) for Doom II. It uses the music track "Damage Assessment" by Mark Klem.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Sigrún Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Sigrún, the Valkyrie, descending from the heavens in shimmering celestial armor. With wings spread wide, she commands the skies, inspiring heroism on the battlefield. Her piercing gaze and each beat of her wings embody Valkyric majesty, making her a beacon of honor and celestial beauty.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Selene Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Selene, the vampire lord, who emerges from the shadows draped in regal attire. Commanding the night with immortal authority, her crimson eyes blaze with eternal wisdom. Her haunting gaze and elegant yet menacing presence embody the vampiric allure and eternal beauty of the shadowy realm.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Poppy Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Poppy, the wood fairy, radiating whimsical energy in the enchanted woods. Adorned in colors of blooming flowers, she joyously flits about, guarding nature and echoing woodland melodies. Her dewdrop-sparkling eyes capture the charm and playful spirit of the fairy realm.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Michiko Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Michiko, the martial artist, whose discipline and precision in every move testify to years of training. Dressed in a martial arts gi that highlights her prowess, she moves with focused intensity. Her commanding presence and serene eyes reflect mastery of strength and combat technique.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Luna Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images featuring Luna, the necromancer cloaked in night-sky robes, reigning in shadowed realms with eerie mystique. Mastering forbidden arts, her gaze raises and commands the dead, epitomizing necromantic power and spectral beauty.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Ivy Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with IVY, the witch, who emerges from the shadows in mysterious robes whispering ancient incantations. Her eyes, aglow with arcane wisdom, and her enigmatic presence converge as she traces sigils and weaves spells with ethereal grace.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Freya Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images featuring Freya, who combines ferocity and grace on the battlefield. Wielding her weapon with unyielding determination, her gaze embodies the untamed spirit of the North, marking her as the epitome of Viking prowess and the beauty of a warrior maiden.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Fiona Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Fiona, the human princess, who graces her realm with a gentle, regal aura. Adorned in attire befitting her royal stature, her presence blends grace and kindness, with a benevolent gaze that oversees her kingdom. Her compassionate heart makes her the embodiment of warmth and benevolence in royalty.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Elowen Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Elowen, the elvish dancer, who moves with ethereal grace. Adorned in garments reflecting nature's hues, she twirls elegantly, enchanting onlookers. Her joyful, woodland-inspired eyes and movements celebrate elvish artistry and the harmonious spirit of dance.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Calliope Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Calliope, the Greek queen, whose regal presence and divine authority command attention. Draped in Olympian robes, her gaze and gleaming crown reflect the wisdom and poise of her sovereign rule.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Brunhilda Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Brunhilda, the berserker, who roars into battle with primal ferocity. Clad in battle-worn armor, her tempestuous presence and fiery eyes showcase the unyielding spirit of a true warrior. Each swing embodies the might and awe-inspiring force of a berserker.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Astrid Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Astrid, the warrior, who traverses realms of valor with unyielding spirit and noble strength. Her fierce gaze and gleaming axe embody the courage and beauty of a true warrior.

name: Astérix & Obélix XXL 2: Mission Wifix
description: The PSP port of Astérix & Obélix XXL 2: Mission Las Vegum adds a multiplayer mode that can accommodate up to four players for team and objective-based missions. One team must achieve an objective (collecting herbs, defending the village, stealing a magic potion) while the other must prevent it. AI-controlled teammates can join in if there aren't enough players available.

name: Fantasy Beauties - All Girls Photo Pack
description: This content pack enables you to instantly access all photo packs in Fantasy Beauties. 36 levels await you, giving you a chance to feast your eyes on 36 depictions of stunning, myth-inspired goddesses.

name: Pierre Hotel
description: Sin descripción

name: Fantasy Beauties - Premium Edition
description: A premium edition of the game Fantasy Beauties that contains the girls Ophelia, Jade, Freya, Luna and Poppy from the beginning.

name: Habla Kadabla
description: Sin descripción

name: Castle Crashers: Painter Boss Paradise
description:
We used to be enemies. We used to destroy the world around us. Now, we create!
The DLC will include:
Steam workshop capabilities – create your own knight skins, choose your magic, and share with the world!
New official character: play as Paint Junior, use your imagination, and unleash powerful art to vanquish your foes!
New player and weapon artwork for all official playable characters (with an option to toggle on or off).
Endless knightly possibilities – if you aren’t feeling creative, choose from thousands of community characters or preloaded characters created by our team!

name: The Show
description: The Show is an RTS that will immerse the player in a contemporary world where California is governed by a dictator who sends any opponent to prison. The only way to get out is to participate in a television show, with a huge battlefield on which outlaws and the teams of the show fight each other.

name: Crysis Maximum Edition
description: Crysis Maximum Edition includes Crysis and the new sequel Crysis Warhead. This epic story takes players into a changing environment, forcing them to adapt their tactics and conquer battlefields ranging from newly frozen jungles to gravity-free alien environments. Includes multiplayer such as Crysis Wars, a new multiplayer experience featuring new online game modes and 21 maps. 7 new maps are available for online combat.

name: The Binding of Isaac: Repentance
description: The Binding of Isaac: Repentance is the ultimate edition of the genre-defining roguelike, with so many additions and improvements that it feels like a brand new game. Experience Isaac's adventures with new twists, terrifying turns and over 500 hours of new gameplay!

name: The Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth+
description: The Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth+ is a dungeon-crawling shoot-'em-up that's literally a different game each and every time you play it! The randomly generated maps are built with over 11,000 unique room configurations, each populated with a nearly endless variety of enemies, items, challenges and secrets!

name: SJS1: Streets Of Fear
description: A demon-overrun town. Originally this map was meant to be a part of an expansion to Bloodrust.

name: SJS2: Outpost
description: A dark tech themed map

name: Fervent
description:
A short, VHS - style horror game where you step into the shoes of a paranormal investigator. As you venture into the eerie Fervent Campsite, you'll uncover mysterious obelisks with cryptic symbols, abandoned white tents, and an unsettling ritual book.

Average playtime is 10 minutes.

name: Industrial Fear
description: A short, atmospheric psychological horror where you play as a factory worker finishing his shift. There are multiple endings to complete and collectables

name: Marippy
description: Marippy is a Touhou fan game based on the arcade game Mappy. The game has the player play as Marisa Kirisame as she collects items from Alice Margatroid's house which Alice had stole.

name: Psycho Shopper
description: You have to dodge other shoppers and vehicles while being on a shopping spree.

name: Flutter of birds II: Tenshi-tachi no Tsubasa
description:
The miracle happens again... in another country-

The son of an Englishman and a Japanese woman, our main character is Shin'ya. Having grown up in his father's native land, he wanted to visit the homeland of his mother, who died when he was young. White snow covers the town of Kuramachi. His other hometown, the last trace of his mother. That is where his father and mother met and were married. And the time comes when Shin'ya's wish is granted. His aunt Miyu says she'll look after him at her church..

In his mother's hometown, Shin'ya injures his leg and goes to a clinic. As Shin'ya stays in the small, snow-covered town, waiting for his leg to heal, he encounters various young women.

name: Hayato's Journey
description:
Hayato's Journey is a SEGA Mega Drive / Genesis homebrew game that works like an unofficial spiritual sucessor of Kenseiden, a cult-classic SEGA Master System game.

Hayato's Journey is the first full SEGA Mega Drive / Genesis game powered by the Scorpion Engine by earok.

name: Chill Corner: Extras
description:
This DLC added new characters (included outfits) and pets
- New male character Victor with two outfit
- New female character Emillia with three outfit
- New variants of Cat and Dog
- New exclusive decorator
- New room

name: Step Right Up: Adventure Isle
description: Welcome welcome to Step Right Up: Adventure Isle! The park has now opened with a plethora of things for you to enjoy! Try your luck against 14 anomalies with 5 songs and 6 contestants! See if you can discover the secrets of the park if you're up to it... And always remember to HAVE FUN!

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Sonic
description: Gotta go fast! The iconic Sonic the Hedgehog joins the party.

name: Tribute to Shadow of the Colossus
description: Tribute to Shadow of the Colossus, also known as just 'Tribute', is a passionate Brazilian fan project dedicated to honoring the timeless masterpiece that is Shadow of the Colossus by remaking it on PC and not only restoring all the cut content, but also the ideas that Team Ico could not even began to program due to time constraints. With a soulful dedication, Team Tribute is bringing to life to all the unused colossi —Griffin, Devil, Phoenix, Roc, Saru, Sirius, Spider, Worm, Yamori and Evis— infusing them with the essence of the game's original vision.

name: Beyond the Forbidden Lands
description: Beyond the Forbidden Lands is a non-profit fan-made PC remake of Shadow of the Colossus with the restoration of cut content as a major focus, including the Unused Colossi and removed areas from the game. The game will provide the option of playing as close to the original Shadow of the Colossus as possible, along with the inclusion of a 'Story Mode' which is set before SotC.

name: Mermaid City
description: Sin descripción

name: Jerry's Merry Christmas
description: Sin descripción

name: Saucy Devil Gordon
description: Sin descripción

name: Saucy Devil Gordon 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Shy Guy Surfing
description:
Slide, jump, and float over the ocean in this arcade-style fangame by LucasPucas. With over a dozen unique areas, rip-roaring rival battles, and a brand-new New Game Plus mode, the world of Shy Guy Surfing is packed with content like never before!
Travel across the wild seascape and face off against bosses in Journey Mode, or shoot for a high score in Endurance Mode.
Jam to classic music from the Mario series and more, arranged by an all-star cast of chiptune artists!
Customize your experience with a wide selection of screen borders and unlockable costumes.

name: Artus Against the Demon of the Museum
description: Artus Against the Demon of the Museum is a point-and-click adventure game designed as an educational game to teach children about classical paintings, their history and creators with its main character Artus de mouse.

name: Toolkid Creation
description: Toolkid Creation from Emme studio is an educational game offering kids a set of activities to create art piece on their computer and learn how to start DIY in real life as well.

name: Duskfade
description: Duskfade is a colorful adventure in a world where the torments of the past haunt you. Battle against your memories in a dizzying dance to fade the shadows of the dusk.

name: Fort Boyard: Millennium
description: Trapped in the heart of Fort Boyard, you will have to try to escape by solving many puzzles and avoiding the traps of Arok and his evil creatures. The game uses the fort from the famous TV show of the same name in a platform/horror style.

name: One Helluva Reskin for Pizza Tower
description: Aiming to replace every major character AND boss with beloved characters from Spindlehorse's Helluva Boss and Hazbin Hotel (mostly Helluva). Featuring Moxxie in the place of Peppino trying to save I.M.P along with Millie and that hellhound no one cares about.

name: Space Invaders
description: A fan made version of Space Invaders free to play in your web browser.

name: Dance Gangnam Style
description: Dance Gangnam Style is a bootleg NES game developed by an unknown company. The game is a modded version of another NES bootleg titled "Street Dance", which is a clone of DDR, but instead only including the song Gangnam Style. It is bundled into the Play Vision Portable system.

name: Doraemon: Dorayaki House
description: Doraemon: Dorayaki House is an LCD game by Popy Electronics released exclusively in Japan in 1983.

name: Guitar Hero Barões da Pisadinha
description: Guitar Hero Barões da Pisadinha is an unlicensed game from Brazil that is a rom hack of Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock featuring songs from the band Barões da Pisadinha.

name: Guitar Hero III Suicide
description: Guitar Hero III Suicide is an unlicensed version of Guitar Hero III for the PlayStation 2 which adds more songs.

name: Guitar Hero: Sonic VS Mario
description: Guitar Hero: Sonic VS Mario is a bootleg game for the PlayStation 2 released in Brazil. The game is a modded version of Guitar Hero III featuring primarily songs from the Mario and Sonic games.

name: Guitar Hero: Avril Lavigne
description: Guitar Hero: Avril Lavigne is a bootleg PlayStation 2 game. The game is a modded version of Guitar Hero II which adds songs by Avril Lavigne into the game.

name: Pinko Linko's School
description:
Pinko Linko's School is a game I dug up not too long ago when I was visiting my grandparents. I found it while searching for some old tennis equipment in there storage. The box indicated that it was made in 1998, and yes, you can truly see that it is from that era. The first Doom game also came out in 1998, so this must have been some kind of kids-learning-toy-doom-clone. Anyway, I got it running and managed to rip the files, so here they are!

Side note: I rebinded all the keys from being the arrow keys to wasd, also there were some things in the game that were kind of [REDACTED], but that might have just been me. When you are done with the game you can take a look in the YouWon folder, I left [REDACTED] in there,

name: The Woods Have Horns
description:
Welcome to Camp Shelterlake! Enjoy a beautiful view, take a walk on the woods, and don't be brutally mauled by the legendary Goatman!

Do you have what it takes to survive this pixel-art gorefest?

name: Stealth Kill VR Missions
description: Welcome to D.A.R.P., Operator. You have been chosen to prove your Infiltration, Weapons and Explosives skills throughout various objectives in this Physics based Stealth Action VR Game. Candidates unable to comply or show signs of weakness, will be terminated immediately.

name: Jefe, La Cuenta
description: Sisebuto has a problem. He likes to drink a lot and pay very little. And today, the trip home is going to be fun. Everything is going to go from bad to worse.

name: Mystery Science Theater 3000 Presents: Detective
description: A rewrite of Matt Barringer's incredibly bad game "Detective", this game was ported to Inform and subjected to treatment with Mystery Science Theater 3000 sarcasm.

name: Barista
description: A standalone freeware First-Person Shooter powered by ZDoom.

name: Oxygen Not Included: The Frosty Planet Pack
description: The Duplicants find themselves out in the cold, trying to keep the colony - and themselves - alive in a world of ice and snow!

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Axel
description:
Axel from Crazy Taxi Joins the Rumble!

Enjoy playing as Axel in either Adventure Mode or Battle Mode!
As Axel, you'll be picking up Coins instead of Bananas!

name: Foxo's Fun Schoolhouse
description: Foxo's Fun Schoolhouse is an educational fun game where you have to find comics for a friend! Foxo, the main teacher will help you with your adventure. It won't be an easy though!

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak - Voice Set
description: This set includes the following DLC: Holo Core Voice: Renne Bright, Holo Core Voice: Judith Lanster and Holo Core Voice: Barkhorn.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak - Bonus Set
description: This set includes various cosmetic DLC and some consumable item sets.

name: Sudoku Infinite
description: A typical sudoku game with an endless supply of new Sudoku puzzles to solve.

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Beat
description:
Over the Hood, Through the Streets - Beat from Jet Set Radio Joins the Rumble!

Roll with Beat in either Adventure Mode or Battle Mode!
Pick up Spray Paint Cans instead of Bananas as you skate your way through each stage.

name: Lots of Cats in Every Moment
description: “Lots of Cats in Every Moment” is a game where you find hidden cats while romance unfolds!

name: Lots of Cats in Every Moment: The Whereabouts of the Photo
description: “Lots of Cats in Every Moment: The Whereabouts of the Photo” is an expansion pack that contains the latter part of the story from the base game.

name: Forestrike
description: Forestrike is a tactical kung-fu fighting game with a supernatural twist. Use your 'foresight' ability to visualize fights before they happen and hone your skills then rumble in reality, where defeat means starting over from scratch.

name: Fallen Lights
description: Sin descripción

name: Patter
description: Pattern-matching game using only the mouse. Made by Stuffed Wombat and Gaziter.

name: Gallop Racer
description: Just like in real horse racing, no two races are alike: race outcomes are determined by racetrack, conditions, pack and luck. A great party game for players and spectators alike, you can be the jockey, or select watch mode, and be a spectator. As the jockey, you decide when to hold back, move inside, move outside and go for the lead horses even change lanes, get bumped, get blocked and lose ground on curves. The winners are put out to stud, and the losers, put out to pasture.

name: Vectorman
description: Vectorman for the PlayStation 2 is an unreleased reboot of the Vectorman series (consisting of Vectorman and Vectorman 2 for the Sega Mega Drive) developed by Pseudo Interactive for Sega.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean: New Horizons
description: Sin descripción

name: Wayne's World
description:
Wayne's World is an adventure game based on the movie with the same name. The game itself is a classic point and click adventure, and should not be confused with the platform game based on the movie.

You play both Wayne and Garth, and you can switch between them at any time. The plot is simple; In an attempt to save their tv-show, Wayne and Garth decide to hold a pizza-thon (a charity show with a pizza-theme) in order to raise money. In order to be able to hold the pizza-thon Wayne and Garth must embark on several quests to collect items and hire people they need for the show. The adventure includes participating in babe-jeopardy, joining a biker's gang and baking pizza. The graphics are in 2D and the sound contains several samples from the movie.

name: Penny Dell Sudoku
description: The right time to play some sudoku is all the time. Have somewhere to be? Save your progress locally so you can finish the puzzle later. Come back every day for a fresh new Sudoku puzzle!

name: Ogre Labs
description: Ogre Labs is a single-level PWAD for Doom II by Russell Pearson. It is a very large tech-base themed map for limit removing ports and uses the Doom music track "The Imp's Song" by Robert Prince.

name: Carpathian Skies
description: Sin descripción

name: Tactical Strike: Special Forces Shooter
description: Your mission is to eliminate enemies, free hostages and defuse bombs to ensure safety and peace in an exciting first-person shooter!

name: Looped: Love at first sight
description: Looped is a short interactive story told through hand-drawn animation. Guide Him and Her through the chapters of their story by solving peaceful mini-puzzles and find a way out of the

name: Gallop Racer Online
description: Gallop Racer Online was a Windows-based online game released only in Japan, based on the same series.

name: The Well of Heaven-Reaching
description: the Well of Heaven-reaching is a platforming game. Choose from a variety of jumps where you'll need to make your way through traps and obstacles to reach the top of the Well of Heaven-reaching.

name: Love Curse: Find Your Soulmate
description: It is a girls' love visual novel set against the backdrop of college and the workplace. The protagonist carries a love curse and is searching for her true love. However, as events unfold, she finds herself facing even bigger challenges...

name: End's beginning
description: 'End’s beginning' is a Japanese-style fantasy romance visual novel. As Carter Evan, uncover the truth behind his death and Shermanland's fall. With a nearly 300,000-word script, experience four unique relationships: Brother and Brother, Monarch and Knight, God and Follower, and Vampire and Prey.

name: On All Clear Days
description: A short visual novel set in the post-war world

name: The Walls Still Stand
description: Step into the eerie Kowloon Walled City in "The Walls Still Stand", an indie horror walking simulator. Complete daily tasks, uncover dark secrets, and explore with 3D spatial sound. Think critically to unlock all six endings in this 1-2 hour journey. Can you escape the city's grip?

name: Tritime Space
description: A stand-alone monster-killing game that performs action strikes and releases cool skills according to the beat of music: -- You can sense energy from the rhythm, and the energy will be transformed into stronger power!

name: Kanban-mura
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Commanders
description: Turn-Based Sci-Fi Strategy Game

name: Wayfarer
description: Progress thought labyrinthine caves and solve entertaining puzzles. Explore this incredible adventure where loneliness becomes your closest companion as you search clues amidst stunning landscapes and ancient ruins.

name: Cute Socks
description: Cute Socks is an interactive story about an eighteen-year-old girl who is home alone. She quickly sheds her clothes and begins playing around the house in just her socks. When her friend Julia arrives, their friendship turns into a budding lesbian relationship full of happiness and multiple orgasms!

name: Neon Express
description: Take the helm in this cyberpunk uber driver narrative mystery. Traverse the city delivering contraband and nefarious passengers. Rekindle old contacts and reconnect with an underworld you were trying to leave behind.

name: Monster Charmer
description: Delve into a mystical world teeming with goblins, orcs, minotaurs and more in this adult deckbuilding RPG. Traverse through a beautiful fantasy world, collect powerful cards, and construct your deck of charms and spells as you fight - or charm - your way to victory!

name: Recursive Riftfall
description: Explore dungeons, collect loot, and avoid dangers in this exotic looter! Play solo or with as many as the host can handle. Power your ship and yourselves with the resources you find to ensure your continued survival.

name: Balkan Bloodbath
description: Become the next great dictator to forge a new Balkan Empire. Navigate the intense world of international trade and the stock market, use cunning espionage tactics to disrupt opponents, and overthrow and conquer your enemies. Strategy and secrecy are your keys to success in the Balkans.

name: Myth & Mirage
description: Hack and slash your way through the Tombs of Oasis. Extracting with your loot will require all the skill your team can muster as you mow down vicious monsters, face deadly traps and slaughter other players! Carefully craft your build and customize your character with unique items and skill trees.

name: Silence-Dream
description: 《Silence Dream》is a indie puzzle game. you could take on the role of musican, change or retain different abilities and take it into difference scence, gradually uncovering the man's past.

name: Overtime Heroes Exit 8
description: You are in A CORPORATE SLAVE walking simulator. Being trapped in an infinite loop space, you just wanna find way to get off. Find out the anomalies in floors and choose the elevator carefully! Only the correct one can get you out.

name: Phasmonauts
description: Phasmonauts is a 4 player local co-op supernatural roguelite. Cryptid sightings are on the rise! It’s up to you and your friends to invent ghost-hunting equipment to solve the mystery and fight these supernatural creatures.

name: Rise of Kenshin
description: Demons invasion, the young heroes face the heavy siege of the enemy, they fought in blood and finally recovered the lost land. This is a national style Roguelike casual game, players can play a variety of roles, gradually grow, and experience the hearty grass-cutting battles.

name: Fantasy Girls
description: Fantasy Girls is a simple to learn, arcade style 'Find similar pictures' game.Test your skills by matching and linking the same kind of images and work your way up to victory!

name: Dawn of Defense
description: Dawn of Defense is a Roguelite Tower Defense game with RTS elements. Surrounded by enemies, your tribe is the last bastion against the Empire. Build towers to fight enemy troops in the trenches, train warriors and retake territory to build on. Reclaim your lands and defeat the baneful Empire!

name: Nine in Flight
description: An absurdist mystery for only the most hard-boiled interim junior detectives.

name: Shoot to Pleasure
description: Let's shoot wildly together!

name: Synthetic Soul 3
description: Synthetic Soul 3 is an immersive modern life sim with in-depth robot companions. Discover your true worth and climb to the peak.

name: Feel the Fear Around
description: First person videogame. Help save the world from the zombie invasion through 5 levels. Always reload ammo and shoot them in the head to defeat them first. WORKING AT MORE DIFFICULT LEVELS.

name: PlasticFighter
description: In the game "Plastic Fighter" you are waiting for an exciting mission in a factory, which has been mined and threatens to explode in just 30 minutes. Your task is to explore the factory, find and disarm all the explosive devices placed, and fight with the armed guards.

name: Plati and the Tower of Time
description: Plati and the Tower of Time is a challenging precision platformer with a focus on mobility and speed. Use your grappling hook to swing around multiples levels to find out what is at the end of the tower as fast as you can.

name: Park It!
description: Park It! is a grid-based puzzle game that involves the challenging vehicle maneuver of parking a car!

name: Lady Godiva
description: Lady Godiva is immersed in her tireless quest for revenge and justice. In the first period, set in a distant and turbulent past, a powerful and fearless female figure emerges, whose true name remains shrouded in mystery. She, however, is confused with the legendary historical figure who rode naked.

name: Sperm Into Labia
description: Anaïs, a porn influencer, plunges into a whirlwind of sensations that defy her understanding and awaken her deepest anxieties. Unable to escape the clutches of her agoraphobia, insomnia becomes her constant companion, fueling her relentless pursuit of carnal satisfaction.

name: Mod Mage Mike
description: Mod Mage Mike is an action puzzle game where you use a node editor to program futuristic magic spells. Hit detectors placed in tricky locations, blast evil robots with custom-made spells, or use the built-in level editor to create and share your own imaginative levels.

name: Emergency in Space
description: You are the sole survivor aboard an abandoned space ship, lost in the vastness of space. Silence reigns around you, with the sounds of cosmic waves and the echoes of the ship's systems. Your mission is to survive.

name: Tame It Too!
description: This is the sequel to the game Tame It! The adventures of Lee, who crashed and found himself on a desert island, continue! A new big island full of life and the freedom to explore it, as well as new hot beauties to tame await you in this game.

name: Portal Brawlers
description: Portal Brawlers is a Beat-em-Up set in a vibrant fantasy world. Follow Thunk and friends as they wreak havoc across the land, trying to stop whatever malevolent force is summoning trouble through these portals!

name: Poker Dungeon: Joker's Madness
description: A combination game between turn-based deck-building and poker rogue-like. Strengthen your stats by combining character cards with poker hands.

name: Mr Snuggles Dungeon Adventure
description: A teddy bear alone in a dungeon, his only hope for escape is... kitchen implements? A zany roguelike adventure with 100+ unique items, 9 bosses, 15+ weapons with upgrades, potion and scroll crafting and random dungeons. Explore, fight collect loot and use pineapples to help Mr Snuggles escape.

name: Warriors of Thalyrion
description: Choose your hero and fight against your friends in different 2D pixelart worlds . Collect more items than your opponent and fight him in close combat or with a ranged weapon.

name: The Very Idle Game
description: The most satisfying idle clicker game in the world

name: Vincent
description: Explore the life of Vincent, a homeless man with a mysterious past, in this Jump&Walk game. Dive into his yellowed sketches, each revealing a hidden memory. Uncover secrets, visit idyllic places, and discover the truth.

name: Megadungeon
description: A fast paced, turn based dungeon crawler.

name: Why Did The Chicken Cross The Road?
description: A pixel-art shooter roguelike with almost infinity of options to upgrade your weapons. Will you be able to fly the coop and find the answers that your people have been searching for years?

name: Memory Quickie
description: Embark on a nostalgic journey with Memory Quickie, the classic card-matching game reimagined for the digital era. Test your memory and concentration as you uncover pairs of cards in this timeless pastime.

name: Pixel Fish
description: An eater with action roguelite elements. Swim around a hostile sea while you avoid dangers and eat fish to gain experience and grow. Play as one of twelve unlockable characters, each with different traits. Earn evolution points to upgrade your stats, allowing you to eat ever-larger fish.

name: Firework Syndrome
description: You'll respond to the villagers' requests as the new Pyrotechnician of the village called Natsuwa. Draw your own fireworks and use them to mark special moments and illuminate the night sky to touch every heart with your dazzling artistry.

name: Nurikabe World
description: Nurikabe World is a relaxing logic puzzle game where you solve puzzles by creating islands and connecting rivers to create beautiful sceneries. Experience different landscapes and seasons, solve puzzle campaigns and create your own levels.

name: Eldoria: The Cursed Crown
description: Explore Eldwyrm's vast open world, engage in strategic combat, and craft gear. Encounter dynamic NPCs and choose your story path in this immersive RPG.

name: Stupid Space Shooter
description: This game is a Stupid Space Shooter. Control your ship to blow up the bad guys, they are red. Levelup to gain upgrades to fight more bad guys

name: The Trials 2
description: The Trials is a mesmerizing puzzle and exloration game that will challenge your mind, this game takes you on an unforgettable journey through an island filled stunning environment. Master the art of teleportation, time manipulation, moving between alternate world to solve intricate puzzles.

name: Lady Death Demonicron
description: LADY DEATH: DEMONICRON is an all new side-scrolling, sword slicing, magic wielding, 15 level, multiplayer beat-em-up that takes the best aspects of the 1990's arcade classics - all mixed together with a killer 90's industrial-metal soundtrack!

name: Funny Face Apartment
description: "Funny Face Apartment" is a first-person stealth horror game where you, as a caretaker, manage tasks and investigate residents who turn into funny faces. Isolated in danger, you encounter an entity that reveals the mystery behind these transformations, unraveling your chaotic life.

name: Paranatural
description: A new, innovative ghost hunting horror game. Work together with up to 3 others or go solo identifying and exorcising ghosts! Experience horror gaming beyond anything you've ever seen before with a fully dynamic ghost system, a built-in level editor, player customization, VR support, and more!

name: Cape Fathom
description: In Cape Fathom you have been tasked with restoring an abandoned restaurant in an effort to return prosperity to a once bustling region. Utilize various, but limited, resources to source the highest quality ingredients for your patrons. Use your influence to shape the local economy and environment.

name: Collapse Machine
description: Collapse Machine offers the ultimate adventure in an infinite procedural immersive world. Traverse the sands in a mobile home vehicles, exploring secrets and treasures with friends (or foes), all while experiencing the thrill of discovery without constraints

name: Neurose Neurones
description: It's time to play catch-up! Can you bring home the cute kitty safely and find out the truth about the death of the ghosts and the cause of the Neuron family's insanity?

name: Jump Ball Jump!
description: Jump Ball Jump! is an exciting and challenging game that tests your ability to calculate trajectories and angles.

name: UFO Enemy Known
description: Help aliens invade Earth in this procedurally-generated, infinite, 3D shooter game. Fully destructible cityscapes and a wide variety of destruction-wreaking weapons. Visit (rampage and destroy) cities of future Earth and Mars block by block. Chaotic battle scenes as rubble and vehicles pile up.

name: Go Up Bird!
description: Navigate through narrow passages and avoid the encroaching obstacles that threaten to end her lofty quest.

name: Our Little Friend
description: Our Little Friend is a short horror game that follows your "Little Robot Friend" and it's completely trustworthy and reliable instructions for some silly and innocent lil' games!

name: Santaower Defense
description: Defend Santa's house from hordes of ghosts with defense various structures and also with your own sword.

name: Null Reference Exception
description: Become a future AI and delve into 3D bullet hell action in an advanced lab. Combine various modules, repeat combat training, enhance stats with research points, and earn achievements to develop your unique combat style. Enjoy overcoming waves of enemies and defeating bosses within time limits.

name: My Maid Girls
description: Neko girls are ready to serve! They are ready to wash your clothes, shine your shoes, clean your house, even give you a massage if you need it...(^ ∇ ^ *)

name: Pillow Pinky
description: Pillow Pinky is a 2D collectathon inspired by classic N64 collectathons like DK64 and Banjo

name: Jumpy Jumptime
description: Jumpy Jumptime is an endearing first-person platforming game that immerses players in the excitement of exploring a world of floating islands. As Jumpy, a lovable alien who has crash-landed, your goal is to recover the scattered parts of your UFO and simply find your way back home.

name: Kilonova
description: Embark on a journey of revenge as Sol, a warrior of the celestial cosmos, as she fights to repel the corruption that has shackled the creatures of a fractured world. Wield her cosmic strength to shatter your foes and expunge the malevolent influence of the cosmos most ancient enemy; The Kilonova!

name: The Adventures Across the Realm: Book One
description: embark on an epic journey where ancient forests, treacherous rivers, and shadowy valleys hold secrets both wondrous and perilous. Guided by destiny and bound by friendship the trio face daunting challenges and unearth forgotten mysteries As they navigate the twists and turns of their quest

name: Weedy's World
description: Weedy's World is a one or two-player game set in a U.P. Michigan dispensary called Glazed & Confused, players navigate a cannabis maze as Weedy or Ms. Weedy, collecting pot leaves and using power-ups while avoiding aliens. Inspired by Pac-Man, the game adds a unique twist with 420-themed humor.

name: Vague Lizards
description: Vague lizards again annoy poor rus! This time they stole the precious Baikal Voditsa and deprived rus of the only source of strength. Take your saber in your fist and show these lizards who is the boss of this village!

name: The Process: Need a Job?
description: In this point and click job simulator you will engage with multiple distractions as you attempt to meet your daily quota. Managing your time, strategizing your next actions, and quick response times will get you far in this game!

name: BalloonBreaker
description: Welcome to Balloon Breaker, the addictive and exhilarating game that will keep you entertained for hours! Your mission is simple but challenging: inflate and pop as many balloons as possible using your trusty mouse. Enjoy your balloons!!!

name: Red Thread
description: Dive into "Red Thread," a singleplayer strategy card game where you navigate life's complexities through relationships. Build connections, manage challenges, and achieve your goals. Each choice shapes your destiny. Can you weave your path to success?

name: Sdies
description: Explore a surreal world full of contrasts: black and white, friends and enemies, serenity and agitation. When the time comes, what we resist will persist, what we accept will transform, and through self transformation, we will discover the spectrum in between.

name: Grandpa High on Retro
description: Grandpa goes on a retro, third-person, action-adventure game, with his grandson after he got a phone call.

name: DreamyPoems
description: "Dream Poem" is a casual elimination game, born out of Chinese poetry culture. Like many traditional games, you only need to select the correct words according to the graphics to enjoy the fun of elimination. You don't need a background of cultural knowledge or to learn Chinese characters.

name: Invasion: Phoenix
description: Delve into the immersive world of Invasion: Phoenix, a meticulously crafted 2D top-down pixel art RTS by a dedicated solo developer. Join the battle to defend Earth as the Zyrex Empire launches an unyielding assault on humanity's doorstep. Will you rise to the challenge and save our planet?

name: Night Crow
description: Night Crow is a multiplayer (1-4 player) horror decryption game where players need to collaborate and interact to decrypt and embark on the next adventure If you are brave, you can also go alone Each different scene type and terrorist event is worth exploring for you

name: Time Trials
description: The first time travel game that approaches time travel from a strictly paradox free philosophy. When in the past, the player is unable to take any action that would alter an observed event in the future.

name: Homecall
description: Horror-ambiance in low-poly. Open-ended exploration, investigation, hidden items, interesting puzzles and intriguing dark storyline.

name: Undead Paradise
description: First Person wave-based horde survival. Defeat endless hordes of enemies to reach higher scores!

name: Nobodies: Silent Blood
description: Step back into the shoes of Asset 1080, the intelligence agency's top cleaner. Puzzle your way through 14 unique locations, devising clever ways to hide all evidence of your employer's deadly actions. Get in, get out, and leave no bodies behind.

name: The King is Dead
description: You're entangled in a royal conspiracy. A deadly game where the pieces can become friends, foes, lovers, and of course… sacrifices.

name: Dungeum
description: Embark on an endless turn-based adventure in Dungeum, a strategic dungeon crawler where every decision shapes your journey through treacherous depths.

name: Parkour Master
description: Master precise jumps and timing as you parkour your way through 10 levels filled with challenging obstacles and unique platform types.

name: Heart of Altai
description: A walking simulator about a mysterious story in the mountains of the Altai Republic.

name: Robin In Da Hood
description: Robin in da Hood is a light and humorous take on the famous legend of Robin Hood. It is a 3D, top-down single player action-adventure game set in medieval England.

name: Ports of Call Deluxe 3D 2024
description: Ports of Call Deluxe 2024 in 3D Version of the The classic trade- and shippingsimulation. Create your own Shiptrading company and also lern how to navigate. Multiple Players and stereo. created by Rolf-Dieter Klein and Martin Ulrich starting with the classic Amiga Version.

name: Fish Flash
description: A simple arcade game where you maneuver your net to the left, right, and middle positions to gather as many fish as you can while avoiding the nasty snakes. Playing earns currency that can be spent on cosmetics. Do you love fishing and fashion? Then Fish Flash is for you!

name: Runet Legend
description: To move further along the plot, you need to complete quests, look for various items that will help you get closer to the finale. Exciting adventures, secrets of the past and difficult decisions are waiting for you. Control the fate of Ozon671Games and help him figure out this difficult situation.

name: Mercenary Tactics
description: Command a squad of mercenaries to battle monstrous foes across five stages. Start small, strategically deploy and upgrade your team using earned resources. Build an unstoppable force and prove your tactical skills by surviving the onslaught and securing victory.

name: Slime Climb: A Count Pumpcula Tale
description: Bounce, Jump and Slide your way out of The Abyss. It's time to Slime Climb!

name: Gorilla Adventure
description: Climb, slip, and soar through the neon-drenched cityscape in Gorilla Adventure! Unleash your inner ape and enjoy the freedom of parkour with primal instincts!

name: Traders and Tricksters
description: An online multiplayer board game with a twist: Gather all the cards or trick others into getting fake cards.

name: Full English City
description: This game combines English Practice with the gameplay of a “Card Battler”. Collect cards by freely creating English sentences and win battles while building unique decks.

name: Gallop Racer
description: A mobile version of Gallop Racer for iOS/Android.

name: Raid on Rift
description: Be prepared to defend your Ore in this multiplayer turn-based strategy game! Take control of the Imperial Navy or the dreaded Space Pirates, and use a variety of crewmates to take your opponent's Ore before they take yours!

name: Status One
description: Status One is a top-down 3D tactical shooter where you create your own task force from scratch and lead your squad while being personally on the field

name: Magic Storm
description: Slay thousands of monsters and survive the night raids, where new bosses and monsters appear. Magic Storm is a casual game with roguelite elements where your choices make all the difference, create custom builds and survive the final eclipse

name: Shoot or Die
description: 'Shoot or Die' is a thrilling 2D shooting game where you take on the role of the last human survivor facing a robotic uprising. Arm yourself with powerful weapons, such as the Fireball and Shield, and utilize game-changing perks, to navigate dynamic battlefields and outwit cunning enemy droids.

name: UpUpUp
description: UPUPUP is a jumping action game. Go up to the sky with the lonely protagonist. Navigate through multiple obstacles, try not to fall, and reach your destination. To reward your efforts, your jumping power will increase as you jump. It is not saved. Fail, adapt, and try again.

name: Sanctua
description: Sanctua is a thrilling co-op party game where players must work together to survive and escape a cursed tomb. One of them is corrupted and will play as an ancient entity that hunts other explorers.

name: Game Designer Simulator
description: Game Designer Simulator is a pixel game based on real-life themes, with a non-linear storyline and card battles. Players will take on the role of a newly graduated college student in a fictional city based on Shanghai, experiencing everything from interviews to becoming a novice game Designer.

name: Soccer Party
description: Soccer Party is party game of soccer that delivers chaotic 2 vs 2 matches where skill reigns supreme. Dash, kick, and jump your way through unpredictable environments filled with obstacles. No power-ups, no gimmicks - just pure soccer action!

name: Room2Room
description: Children have been vanishing while playing with our brand new Room2Room handheld gaming system. You have been contracted to monitor playtest sessions, document any unwanted quirks, and help young testers play safely.

name: Topworld
description: Explore Topworld, a fantasy sandbox game where you, as a mage, uncover a world of possibilities. Craft, build, fight, and create your world in a charming pixel art style. Shape the land to your liking and experience your unique adventure!

name: Random Core Defense
description: "In 'Random Core Defense,' acquire and enhance cores using limited resources to withstand relentless enemy onslaughts. Defeat powerful bosses and test your strategy to survive until the very end!"

name: Shape Survivor
description: Damn it, quickly kill the enemies surrounding you. Choose your weapon, freely combine weapon enhancements, and obtain advanced effects when fully reinforced.

name: Over The Horizon
description: Over The Horizon is a stylish action metroidvania. Take down enemies in Stylish and defeat boss battles with partner characters as you journey across a world full of secrets. As Ravi, you take to the streets to find your parents and uncover a conspiracy to save the world on the giant planet Horizon.

name: Time in Place
description: A first person sandbox narrative, set in an ever changing cozy apartment. Live in the moment of different mornings, spanning 30 years. Make coffee, play piano, or work on your novel. Uncover clues about the unfolding life around you, or take photos of the morning light coming through the windows.

name: Sweet Home
description: "Sweet Home" has been transformed into a roguelite game.Pick two weapons and set their unique skills.Take down the monsters consumed by desire and liberate 'Cha Hyun Soo'.As a fan of the original, you'll find a richer experience in "Sweet Home".

name: Locust Hunter
description: Though faraway, they shall be vanquished! "Locust Hunter" is a third-person, level-based space shooter game. Pilot WHEEL fights through Locust defenses with lasers, missiles, and more. Her ally, NIGHT, gathers parts for weapon upgrades. Enjoy unlimited ammo and regenerating armor—just push forward!

name: Elasticritters!
description: Elasticritters!, the dynamic, fast-paced precision platformer filled with daring jumps and wild stunts. Hone your skills and see if you have what it takes to master this exhilarating bouncy adventure!

name: The Lodge
description: Renting lodges for living, your company offers the best suburban rent services. Unleash the story behind every customer by joining them during the accommodation!

name: Drunken Rogue
description: The rowdy adventures of drunk-as-a-skunk Rogue Lita and Vampire of Demise Endo! Stagger around traps and stumble through demon assaults. Make your way to the dungeon's deepest depths—rumored to contain the most precious of booze!

name: Shinonome Abyss: The Maiden Exorcist
description: The main character is a shrine maiden named "Yono," who has to survive in a haunted houses where Mononoke (yokai and vengeful spirits) lurk, using a limited number of items and traps in this strategy roguelike horror action game!

name: Tales of the Valente
description: Transforming play into empowerment, guiding players through magical adventures to conquer fears with courage and compassion. Complete puzzles, races and befriend all different kind of creatures to help Bastien overcome his fears.

name: The Art Collector
description: You're an artist tasked with taking over an art gallery in order to help your mentor. Customize your gallery and home, befriend local artists while you get them the exposure they need, and master the fine art of selling fine art in this narrative-driven, capitalism-management, shopkeeper, RPG, Sim.

name: LumberKill
description: LumberKILL is a Lore-rich Psychological Horror Adventure game about working at a Lumbermill. You will be tasked with increasingly suspicious jobs by your shady boss, each more unsettling than the last. Chop trees, Process logs, and summon god himself in this terrifying game!

name: The Glitch Witch
description: In a tech-dead future, you play as Rosette, repairing broken tech by solving circuit puzzles to uncover the lost power of 80s technology. She is thrilled about this discovery - until she faces accusations of witchcraft. Will friendship triumph, or force her to choose between power and acceptance?

name: Journey to the Rift
description: Uncover the secrets of a mysterious dungeon in this text-based adventure, where every adventure is different! Monsters, puzzles, and strange secrets await within, in this quest where the only limit is your imagination!

name: Custom Party
description: Custom Party is a free indie party-game. Players can use different powers (dash, explosion...) and have different stats based on their character customization. It introduces an innovative ranking system named «Take a Risk». The game allows everybody to play in the playstyle they want.

name: Flex Riders
description: Flex Riders is a multiplayer racing game with a unique skate-car physics. Nail sick tricks to obtain combat items and take down your rivals. Race across procedurally generated maps and test your friendship in local or online matches. Race, Skate, and Fight!

name: Gravitee Wars
description: Battle across the galaxy in this turn-based space artillery game. Use the gravity of destructible planets to launch your shots at the enemy until only one team remains.Unlock new gear for your team members in the single player campaign and online multiplayer modes.

name: Galaxy Rush
description: Feel the thrill of galactic racing! The most exhilarating grand prix of the spacefaring age is upon us, and the audience is waiting for you. Gear up and start your engines, for the Galaxy Rush is about to blast off!

name: Dog Walking Sim
description: Dog Walking Sim is a first-person experience, that invites players into a virtual world where the simple joys of walking with a canine companion become an adventure in itself. Players can immerse themselves in a relaxing environment and play with their dog or go on quests and collect other dogs.

name: Golden Warden
description: A turn-based roguelike battle game with easy controls. Choose a card each turn to reach the depths of the dungeon and acquire the treasures guarded by the Golden Warden.

name: Bravest Coconut
description: You're a little cat named Coco and you're off on a big adventure. Get to know the locals, solve puzzles, fight monsters, find treasure, and explore the beautiful valley in this classic action RPG.

name: Orion71 Shooter Mayhem Arena
description: Survive the cybernetic apocalypse in this intense roguelike shooter. Fight hordes of zombies, giants, and dragons with high-tech weaponry. Navigate deadly traps and scarce resources for a unique challenge in every playthrough.

name: The Hope
description: Join a desperate father in his quest to find his daughter, in this first-person horror survival game. Unravel the mysteries of his old town and confront unimaginable horrors to reunite with his lost daughter.

name: Never Be Alone
description: Dive into the post-apocalyptic realm of 'Never Be Alone,' an expansive open-world game designed for both solo and multiplayer experiences. In this zombie survival adventure, you can seamlessly team up with friends or brave the dangers alone.

name: Paw Pirates
description: Paw Pirates is a 2v2 party game with cute critters! Tackle, Dodge and Blow Up your friends as you compete to take out their pirate ship! Choose team Cat or team Dog to plunder across a multitude of levels!

name: Deep Sea Hunter
description: A game similar to flying aircraft, where players navigate submarines in the vast depths ocean, engaging in thrilling fishing expeditions and mysterious deep-sea explorations through meticulous strategy and flexible mouse control. Unparalleled in its exhilaration, come play for the ultimate rush!

name: Roswell Ranch
description: Howdy, stranger! Hide from a vigilant UFO, find weapon components, and protect the farm from malevolent extraterrestrial threats.

name: PafuPafu
description: PafuPafu is a party game that combines match-three mechanics with multiplayer brawling elements.

name: Mental State. Game One
description: A fantastic first-person adventure with elements of the action and horror genres. A feature of the game is the "System of Thoughts" - a kind of generator of quests and various thoughts in the head of the main character, which directs and motivates the player to explore the outside world.

name: Cyclics
description: Cyclics is a 4-Keys Rhythm Game mixed with Catch The Beat in a circular playing field. Test your left right hand coordination and your rhythmic sense.

name: The Guilty Hearts
description: Seoyeon Yu, a former police officer, works as a private investigator for a rich family. However, during her investigation, she discovers evidence linking them to her husband's death. Using her ability to see people's guilt, she begins an investigation to solve the mystery.

name: Heavenly Parasite
description: Heavenly Parasite is a 2D, hand drawn assist fighting game and will hopefully be available early 2025.

name: Relentless Impetus
description: Classic FPS gameplay with exploration

name: Last Mile
description: Last mile - is a first-person car horror game. It seems that you are in a spatial anomaly, you drive through the same places from time to time, maybe your GPS navigator doesn't work? Or maybe there are really, really strange things happening here.

name: Heist Hustle: The Unrecord Bank Job
description: Heist Hustle: Bank Job urges you to master thievery. Lead a cunning crew in high-stakes heists, using unique skills to infiltrate, take hostages, crack safes, and seize all cash. Time is vital as you await the getaway van for a swift escape. Are you the perfect crime mastermind?

name: I Ching: Mysteries of Wenlu
description: A groundbreaking word game infused with wisdom and challenges of the Book of Changes. Solve puzzles through text manipulation and unravel intricacies. Immerse yourself in the tranquility of decoding mystic knowledge of the Chinese civilization.

name: Streetball Fury
description:
Streetball Fury is a fast paced mix of street basketball and brawling pixel art game, with unique characters, maps and cool tunes. Punch, kick or use your super attacks to get hold of the ball and score more points than your opponents by throwing, dunking or unleashing super FURY shots!

Take part in brawling basketball matches. While punching your opponents is always a fun idea, to win you need to score points by dunking, shooting or using your special FURY ultimates. Engage in local and online, solo or co-op street basketball games. Let the match begin!

name: Mr Monkey & Touc
description: An N64 throwback 3D collectathon. Play as Mr Monkey and his partner Touc to save their friends and the jungle they call home, and takedown the robots who threaten it. Explore 7 unique worlds, meet a colourful cast of characters and GO. BANANAS.

name: Floridale Man: The Joy of Chaos
description: Welcome to the sunny state of Floridale! Make the most of your stay by causing problems on purpose, mingling with hotties and gators, and embracing the chaos of life in this comedy physics collectathon.

name: Brawl of America
description: Welcome to Brawl of America, the wackiest physics-based brawler where chaos reigns supreme! Dive into frenetic battles where everything and everyone is a weapon. From chairs and tables to your fellow brawlers, if you can pick it up, you can throw it!

name: Paradise Beach Simulator
description: Paradise Beach Simulator is a first-person management simulation game where you transform an abandoned island into a successful business. Welcome your guests, maintain your equipment, manage your staff, and explore your island, all while restoring the beauty of a lost paradise.

name: Nightmare of May
description: "Nightmare of May" is an atmospheric horror game set in 1960s Southeast Asia. Combining elements of Southeast Asian and Eastern cultures, the game features witchcraft, religious themes, and unsettling imagery for a truly immersive experience.

name: Bestowment
description: The fun and intricacy of a collectible card game meets the endless replayability of a roguelike. Collect terrifying creatures and powerful spells to craft your unique deck in a sprawling campaign seeking audience with the 6 great gods in a quest to discover who you really are

name: The Tragedy at Deer Creek
description: Photographer Charlotte Gray travels to Deer Creek to document a long deserted logging camp for her upcoming book ”Abandoned Alaska”. She finds not only a derelict camp, but also a mournful tale of family, love and loyalty hidden beneath the Alaskan snow, in this point-and-click adventure.

name: Shadow of The Abyss
description: Shadow Of The Abyss is a psychological horror game where you play through the eyes of a bodycam. As a security guard, your job is to survey an office building during a night shift, until you fall into the hands of fate.

name: The Aspirox Case
description: Sin descripción

name: Formula Racing Manager
description: FRM offers a unique sandbox experience you have not seen in any other modern Sports Management game. The game is focused on bringing the management aspect of the motorsport world to life by offering a challenging simulation, where you steer a racing team in a dynamically changing racing world.

name: Poison is Served!
description: "Poison is Served!" is a food taster simulator with mix of cozy management puzzle and narrative-driven roguelike in world where almost all food is poisoned. Taste delicious antic meals, analyze you health and try to survive.

name: Polylylyrhythm
description: Rhythm game to push polyrhythms. Can you play multiple rhythms like 2 beats, 3 beats and 5 beats?

name: Cyber Tunnel Escape
description: Immersive 6 degree of freedom 1000kmh+ high speed flying experience! Drive fast and carefully to survive from a plasma blast as long as you can. Over 2000 different styled tunnels to explore! Support PC & Meta Quest VR.

name: StickmanQuiz
description: "StickmanQuiz" is a game where players control a stick figure to tackle two-choice quizzes. With three modes and nine challenges, players can test their knowledge across various quizzes. They can also compete against 100 NPC rivals. Aim to clear all challenges!

name: Sledge
description: Take your explosive sledgehammer to the skies to pulverize the machines that killed gods and usurped the heavens.

name: Ritter & Rotwein
description: The Past is red. And some Knights recalling it. Storis about the moust Gloryes Duels, sharp weapons and eaven sharper minds. Always looking for wealth, sweet Ladies, and the truth. You play as Ragdoll-Knights with diferent Wappons and Armor Sets out of the 15th century.

name: Icosagon
description: A deck builder tower defense game, in which you create a deck of cards which can used to place down towers that can defeat incoming enemies. Complete campaigns, collect cards, and assemble the best deck!

name: Munches
description: Food, we need food! Help Tixa get food for her village and find out what happened to the harvest, spreading munches and punches!

name: The Hauntings: Surveillance
description: Monitor haunted locations for anomalies as a technician for a secret government agency. Use various camera modes to collect evidence and identify ghosts. Uncover the truth and prevent public panic in this realistic horror spot-the-difference game.

name: Falos
description: Falos: Learn to read 100+ words in 100+ languages while playing a game. A game where you match words to emojis across four different play styles.

name: Linksider
description: Linksider is puzzle platfomer where you can attach different "Side Effects" to the sides of your character. Utilize these effects creatively and you may discover surprising interactions between them to help you solve various puzzles.

name: Talus
description: Explore the unknown lands of Talus. Play the way you want with hundreds of builds to choose from! Complete randomized dungeons, obtain epic loot, craft your perfect gear and hunt down uber bosses. Talus is a Diablo II/Path of Exile inspired Action RPG set in a vibrant fantasy 2D world.

name: Radland
description: Radland is an open world survival game with a deep story and base building elements. Gather resources, build your base, grow your own food trade with survivors, complete the quests and eliminate all raider and mutant threat that is roaming what is left of United States.

name: Websling
description: Websling is an action roguelike game about swinging, battling bugs and collecting powerful items. Bouncing between the past and the future, players take control of a small jumping spider who must use their webs to defeat powerful foes from across time and space.

name: Garden Apocalypse
description: Following a catastrophic invasion by a swarm that has decimated civilization. The protagonist, a resilient country dweller living on the outskirts of urban areas, must use his exceptional horticultural skills to preserve and defend his gardens against relentless swarm attacks.

name: Bad Cat Good Dog Alien Force
description: Bad Cat Good Dog Alien Force is an Arcade Space Wave Defense Shooter. As the forward line, take defense against dimensional invaders and blast your way through waves of incoming enemies. Upgrade your abilities and blast more effectively!

name: Last Mech Standing
description: VR rogue-like, arcade-style shoot-them-up. Pilot the Crimson Slayer, the last giant mech and humanity’s final hope. Slash waves of giant monsters with your sword & blast them with your minigun. Upgrade your weapons & tech along the way, find your fighting style, defeat bosses and level up!

name: Gus Game
description: Gus Game is a multiplayer party game that immerses you in a fantastic world full of hilarious and competitive mini-games. Gus Game allows you to compete against your friends in challenges such as cannonball throwing, obstacle courses, and much more...

name: Project Adrenaline
description: Project Adrenaline is the future of Arena Shooters. Find yourself surrounded by a roaring crowd as you wall-run, climb, slide and kill to ultimate glory. Some would call you an athlete, others see you as a killer; but to the blood-thirsty audience, you are simply known as a neon-gladiator.

name: Jump Higher
description: "JumpHigher" is a 3D game combining jumping and survival elements. Players control a character focused on ascending by jumping, while fending off zombie assaults and strategically choosing supplies to aid their climb towards the peak.

name: Chrono-Shift
description: Solve captivating time travel puzzles. Fight enemies with action-packed movement based combat. Explore a vividly rendered dystopian metropolis. Experience classic, action-packed platformer gameplay.

name: Starsand Island
description: Leave the hustle of the city behind and embrace life on Starsand Island. Fish, farm, raise animals, and befriend or fall in love with locals to learn their secrets. Customize your world with our DIY system, and invite friends to help build your dream paradise!

name: Dino Jump
description: Dino Jump is an endless runner, where you control a dinosaur with a pistol, and a lot of skins to be more stylish!

name: Primest Evil
description: BETRAYAL! As the Prime Evil, you were once the greatest force for bad there was in your slice of the universe...until you got a knife in your back for all your efforts. Rise from your grave again and again in this comedic cartoon roguelike adventure!

name: The Good Plague
description: Uncover a goofy medieval world and its offbeat humor. Choose your hero and challenge your friends and family through a diverse range of minigames in order to escape a plagued kingdom to safety. Playable in local multiplayer from 2 to 4 players.

name: Rancher: A New Life
description: Start a new life as a Rancher. Travel the forest paths by quad bike, raise cattle, build, repair, and improve your farm. Take care of animals, go fishing, cook, grow vegetables, practice your accuracy on shooting range, take photos, and much more. Relax away from the hustle and bustle of the city!

name: PeraPera Mountain
description: Hack and slash your way to the top of PERAPERA Mountain while you learn Japanese. Cast spells, acquire new abilities, build synergies and level up your Japanese skills in each unique run.

name: Echoes of Elpis
description: Echoes of Elpis is a twin-stick shooter sci-fi roguelite. Upgrade weapons, discover new tech, and uncover a secret past as you battle through Elpis on an epic treasure hunt.

name: Space Operators
description: Your mission is to capture newly discovered moons for the Mega Corporation Mining Industry in this retro environment.

name: NecroStone
description: Embark on an action RPG journey as a necromancer, summoning champions and casting powerful necromancy to defeat wicked spirits. It features sandbox elements allowing you to collect various monsters and craft your own powerful champions by directly disassembling and assembling bodies.

name: The Rewinder 2
description: The Rewinder 2 is an action adventure game inspired by eastern mythology. Explore cursed villages, dungeons. Unlock new skills and meet all sorts of ghosts and monsters.

name: Project Forgemaster
description: Inspired by the classic Ragnarok Online, Project Forgemaster is an aRPG where you, a player from the real world, are born in a forge. Summoned for the Realm to level up, explore, and loot monsters. Remember that the king will soon seek your assistance as you forge your path to glory.

name: Kingdoms of Age
description: Kingdoms of Age is an online trading card game, which pits you against other players online to battle in the arena.

name: Bob
description: You are Bob, a floppy ragdoll, gain strength by knocking out enemy 'Bobs'. Use your strength to take on bigger 'Bobs' and knock them down with your fists or any object you find on the ground. (Or just throw the 'Bob' off the edge of the map) Defeat the final Bob and unlock new levels and game modes.

name: Don't Win
description: Don't Win is a small, cosy, puzzle mindbender with platform elements. Whatever you do, DON'T WIN!

name: Fangs & Forges
description: Fangs & Forges is a tactical turn-based RPG. Lead your squad through a medieval high-fantasy world. Recruit characters, accept missions and battle monsters, bandits and more for reputation and loot. Explore the world, level up your characters and stop ancient corruption devouring the world... again.

name: Tickety Boom
description: Join Max and Vic in this gripping 2D pixel art puzzle game as they race against time to defuse a series of sophisticated bombs. But who is planting these elaborate devices? Play now to unmask the mastermind, unravel the mystery and save the city.

name: Vibora
description: The Vibora Virus in Brazil transforms victims into frightening hybrid creatures. It causes fever, convulsions and hallucinations before metamorphosis. The creatures are relentless predators, defying efforts to contain the infection.

name: The Power of Doznath
description: Discover the mysteries around the secret thumb of Doznath.

name: The Dwarf Kingdom
description: Enter the epic fantasy realm of The Dwarf Kingdom - Magic World of War vs Orks and Dragon. Lead your dwarven kingdom to victory through cunning strategy, powerful magic, and skilled diplomacy. Battle fierce enemies, forge alliances, and build your empire in this immersive, action-packed adventure.

name: Keep Driving
description: An atmospheric management RPG about life on the open road. Pick up hitchhikers, work odd jobs, customize and repair your car, and map your route across the country. Use upgrades, skills and items to overcome challenges. And remember to take it easy. You’re young. You have time.

name: Deadly Descent
description: A co-op horror looting game about exploring luminal spaces, evading monsters, gathering valuable loot and selling it to meet the quota

name: Femdom Farm
description: Feel yourself as a pathetic slave at Femdom Farm whose sole purpose is to serve the dominant Mistresses!
